name: Kreo Mirage Wireless RGB Gaming controller gamepad
description: Elevate your gaming experience with this premium controller, compatible with PC, iOS, Android, and PS4. Features customizable back buttons, Luma RGB lighting, macro/turbo functions, hall trigger technology, and 6+ hours of battery life.

name: AK-900 Wired Keyboard
description: Portronics Ki-Pad 2 wired keyboard with dual-color keys, multimedia hotkeys, USB-A cable, and spill-resistant design. Compatible with Windows, Linux, and macOS.

name: IPS LCD Gaming Monitor
description: BenQ MOBIUZ EX251 gaming monitor with 220Hz refresh rate, 1ms GTG, AMD FreeSync, Eye-care Tech, and customizable visual presets for immersive gameplay.

name: S-Series Comfort chair
description: IAFA Diego ergonomic office chair with tilting mechanism, mid-back support, metal base, and sleek black/grey design. Ideal for long work hours.

name: The North Coat
description: Premium insulated women's winter coat offering warmth, comfort, and wind protection with a stylish fit for everyday use.

name: RGB Liquid CPU Cooler
description: High-performance liquid CPU cooler with RGB lighting, efficient thermal management, and quiet operation for gaming PCs.

name: Small Bookshelf
description: Compact wooden bookshelf with 3-tier storage, ideal for organizing books, decor, and small items in any room.

name: Dog Food
description: High-protein dry dog food with essential nutrients to support healthy digestion, strong muscles, and a shiny coat.

name: Digital Camera
description: Compact digital camera with 20MP sensor, 4K video support, optical zoom, and WiFi for easy sharing.

name: Laptop
description: Powerful laptop equipped with an Intel i5 processor, 8GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and a 15.6‚Äù Full HD display. Perfect for productivity, multitasking, and entertainment.

name: Sports Shoes
description: Lightweight and durable sports shoes designed for comfort, grip, and performance. Ideal for running, gym workouts, and casual wear.

name: Beauty Cream and Facewash
description: A skincare combo pack including a nourishing beauty cream and a gentle facewash. Helps brighten the skin, reduce blemishes, and keep your face feeling fresh and hydrated.
